mapper.select: SELECT CODE value, CODE_NAME text FROM CATEGORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEPTH = 1 ORDER BY 2
SELECT CODE value, CODE_NAME text FROM CATEGORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEPTH = 2 AND PARENT_CODE = #{LEVEL1_CODE} ORDER BY 2
SELECT CODE value, CODE_NAME text FROM CATEGORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND DEPTH = 3 AND PARENT_CODE = #{LEVEL2_CODE} ORDER BY 2
SELECT USER_ID value, USER_NAME text FROM USER WHERE TEACHER_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY 2
SELECT USER_ID value, USER_NAME text FROM USER WHERE TUTOR_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY COMP_CD, USER_NAME
SELECT QG_ID value ,GROUP_NAME text FROM QUEST_GROUP WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY 2
SELECT COURSE_CODE value ,COURSE_NAME text FROM COURSE_CODE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND CODE = #{LEVEL3_CODE} ORDER BY 2

SELECT A.COURSE_CODE value ,A.COURSE_NAME text ,C.QUESTION_CNT FROM COURSE_CODE A LEFT JOIN COURSE_MASTER B ON A.COURSE_CODE = B.COURSE_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT COURSE_CODE, COUNT(*) QUESTION_CNT FROM COURSE_EXAM WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' GROUP BY COURSE_CODE ) C ON A.COURSE_CODE = C.COURSE_CODE WHERE B.EXAM_RATE > 0 AND A.CODE = #{LEVEL3_CODE} ORDER BY 2
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m') YYYYMMDD, IFNULL(MAX(CAST(SUBSTR(COURSE_CODE,7,3) AS UNSIGNED)), 0) MAX_SEQ FROM COURSE_CODE WHERE COURSE_CODE LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m'),'%')

SELECT 1 ORD ,COMP_CD value ,COMP_NAME text ,TUTOR_ID FROM COMPANY WHERE COMP_CD = 'B2C' UNION ALL SELECT 2 ORD ,COMP_CD value ,COMP_NAME text ,TUTOR_ID FROM COMPANY WHERE COMP_CD != 'B2C' ORDER BY 1, 2
SELECT SEQ value ,TYPE_NAME text FROM COURSE_EXAM_TYPE WHERE COURSE_CODE = #{COURSE_CODE} ORDER BY 1, 2
SELECT A.COURSE_CODE value ,A.COURSE_NAME text FROM COURSE_CODE A LEFT JOIN COURSE_MASTER B ON A.COURSE_CODE = B.COURSE_CODE WHERE B.REPORT_RATE > 0 AND A.CODE = #{LEVEL3_CODE} ORDER BY 2
